titleStmt.title: Sions elegies. Wept by Ieremie the prophet, and periphras'd by Fra. Quarles
Bible. O.T. Lamentations. English. Quarles. Paraphrases.
titleStmt.author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Stansby for Thomas Dewe, and are to bee sold at his shoppe in Saint Dunstanes Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Another issue of the 1624 edition, with an added bifolium consisting of a preliminary blank leaf and a title page with woodcut frame and dated 1625. Most copies retain the 1624 title page.
Identified as STC 20553 on UMI microfilm reel 1215.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the British Library.
Appears at reel 1215 #2 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy, identified as STC 20553), and at reel 1624 #4 (British Library copy).
